name: Fall Master
description:
Experience the challenge of navigating through 30 meticulously designed levels as you play a puzzle platformer game where falling is your primary means of movement. Test your skills and strategy as the difficulty increases!

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow keys to move.
  • Space / X key to fall

Credits:

  • Sound effects from zapsplat.com and freesound.org
  • Music from zapsplat.com and cafofo's  "Unreleased Game Music Pack"
